ygData.subject: Re: Hunting questions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Possibly, but I d get a sow to be safe. Would suck to get a clops on ya while yer skel bashing ... Not sure what lvl they have become, but I think I read
ygData.messageBody:
>i just have a few questions about hunting in the various zones. i havent
>played for a while, so i just want to see if my info is still relevant...
>
>a. can a 24 necro solo a giant skel (from rathe mtns)? if not, what lvl?

Possibly, but I'd get a sow to be safe. Would suck to get a clops on ya
while yer skel bashing

>b. ive heard there have been changes to the lvls of the unkempt druids. is
>it too dangerous to hunt them at L24?

Not sure what lvl they have become, but I think I read somewhere that there
red to a 40. Wouldn't recommend it

>c. is paw somewhere i should avoid for a while?

Up to you, but I hear theentrance is tuned to a 30, and deeper in back where
you get summon corpse the mobs are about lvl 40 and some 50's have gotten
floored by them.

>d. have any other areas become good to hunt? i was at the treants, and it
>was rather boring. i also only gained about one bubble of xp.

Treants slow? Man at that lvl they were the best xp I had ever seen, got
from 26-30 over a single weekend

>belphenor
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
>tolerated
><< text3.html >>
